args:
Determine whether this NHTSA investigation summary is relevant to the Washington Post. Return `{"result": true}` or `{"result": false}`
content: Incorrect Weight Rating on Label/FMVSS 120

Temsa is recalling certain 2024-2025 TS45 transit buses.  The Gross Vehicle Weight Rating (GVWR) listed on the certification label is incorrect.  As such, these vehicles fail to comply with the requirements of Federal Motor Vehicle Safety Standard (FMVSS) number 120, "Wheels and Rims - Other Than Passenger Cars."An incorrect weight rating may lead to unintentionally overloading the vehicle, increasing the risk of a crash.

Number of Units Affected: 11.0
